We are delighted to announce the [STCausal@GIScience2025](https://stcausal2025.spatial-causal.org/) workshop, to be held in conjunction with [GIScience2025](https://giscience2025.org/) on the 26 August 2025, in Christchurch, NZ.

Check the scope, call for participation, and please, share the word!
